sentences: Tema hakkas töötama kolm aastat tagasi.
context: The verb 'töötama' is the Estonian equivalent of English 'to work'. It indicates engaging in labor or employment activities. This verb can be conjugated to show different tenses and persons, for example: töötan (I work), töötab (he/she/it works), tööavad (they work). It's commonly used when referring to someone having a job or performing work duties.
